title: Kuwait mandates cash declaration for tourists and residents carrying over KD 3,000 via Sahel App
summary_full: Kuwait has launched a mandatory digital cash declaration system via the Sahel App. Travelers carrying over KD 3,000 in cash must now declare it electronically, replacing manual forms. This initiative aims to enhance financial transparency and streamline border processes for all travelers.
